item.title: Cause Inspired Media
item.description:
Cause Inspired Media

We work with Non-Profit organizations big and small all across the U.S. to organize, promote, and share their services with the world. Cause Inspired Media is there for you, whether you just started or have been serving for years. We work with non-profits in managing their digital advertising for them by leveraging our experience with Google AdGrants.

item.title: No title
item.description: WE WORK WITH SMALL NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, AS WELL AS WELL-ESTABLISHED NON-PROFITS

item.title: Cause Inspired Media understands what is important to your organization and develops that passion into successful campaigns to help grow your organization.
item.description:
Cause Inspired Media understands what is important to your organization and develops that passion into successful campaigns to help grow your organization.

We work with non-profits in managing their digital advertising for them by leveraging our experience with Google AdGrants. We utilize the grant in very unique ways, targeting the needs of each organization. For some, we focus more on direct donation while others we use the grant to help nonprofits develop larger corporate donors. With our experience we now manage over 7 million dollars in Google Grants. We are a Google Partner with we are Certified by Google ensuring the highest standards in managing and procuring the Google AdGrant.
